en: Discover who and what Creative Europe funds
The European Union funds thousands of cultural projects and you can find out about all of them in one place: the Creative Europe Dissemination Platform.
Discover who and what Creative Europe funds
57-Web home page (text, logo, image of a department)

Welcome to the Creative Europe platform for the dissemination and exploitation of results. Here you can search project information and find the results of projects supported by the European Commission under the current Creative Europe programme and under the previous Culture 2007-2013 programme.
platform dissemination and exploitation of resul

The portal provides an overview of all new projects supported by the EU's €1.5 billion Creative Europe programme, as well as results and good practices from the former Culture and MEDIA programmes. Information is searchable by keyword, project, region or country and is regularly updated by the organisation running the project.

Creative Europe, launched in 2014, supports artists, authors, film makers and others from the cultural and creative sectors. The former Culture and MEDIA programmes ran from 2007-2013.
